mxCell.value: Application Modules & High Level APIs
Data Stores, Ingestion, Processing, ETL, API Integration

On Device Data Acquisition 
1. On Demand
2. Event Based 
3. Periodic

Storage
1. On Demand - sense & send; no storage
2. Event Based - on device, central storage (server, cloud)
3. Periodic - central storage (server, cloud)
4. DAL - Data Abstraction Layer ( standard sensor data model )

Data Storage
[ Clickhouse, MongoDB, InfluxDB, MySQL, SQLite, Scylla DB ]
[ Blockchain Storage ]

Digital Twin
1. On-demand, Event Based, Periiodic Access
2. Visualization
3. Alerts and Notifications - Email, SMS, WhatsAPP
